DOC.brief_title: Aqueduct Irrigation System Clinical Protocol : Medical Device Investigational Plan
DOC.detailed_description: 1.0 Purpose Investigation 1.1 Name investigational device : Aqueduct model CIS-01 1.2 Intended use investigational device : Automatic Continuous Irrigation Endoscopic procedure . 1.3 Objectives clinical investigation : 1.3.1 Primary objective . Demonstrating efficacy use Aqueduct system : - Continuity flow - Ease operation 1.3.2 Secondary objective ( ) . - Evaluation potential safety issue associate use device ; - Evaluation device design ; - Assessing certain human factor ( e.g. , patient operator ) associate use device ; - Other specified device characteristic device application consideration . 1.4 Anticipated duration clinical investigation : 1 Month 2.0 Clinical Protocol 2.1 Title clinical protocol : Operation automatic irrigation controller endoscopic procedures 2.1.1 Protocol number . Version 01 2.1.2 Version number date . Version 1 , March 4 , 2015 2.2 Study design : 2.2.1 General study design . During study system use surgeon teach system capability , feel correct . Surgeons setup system supply solution flow limiting pressure . Increase flow operation require limit set pressure safety valve 180 cmH2O . Following procedure case report form ( attach chapter 11 ) fill , report single experiment result . Both case use system standard procedure use report summarized table . The result serve analyze equipment performance efficacy . 2.3 Subject selection : 2.3.1 General characteristic propose subject population ( ) . Regular endoscopic procedure patient ( ) . There difference standard procedure use Aqueduct . Only improvements without risk expect . 2.3.2 Anticipated number research subject . Up 30 patient enrolled experiment . They sign consent form explain experiment 2.3.3 Inclusion criterion . Any adult age 18 candidate endoscopic procedure suitable experiment 2.3.4 Exclusion criterion . Only adults age 18 . 2.4 Study procedure : 2.4.1 Screening procedure . The surgeon perform operation suggest use Aqueduct relevant patient . He explain principle system advantage risk mitigation . If patient agrees sign consent form enrol . 2.4.2 Study treatment diagnostic product procedure . The study include series procedure surgeon utilize Aqueduct irrigation instead use current bag pole . The surgeon inspect parameter setting Aqueduct , experiment value may ease procedure . In general try minimal flow minimal pressure use efficiently . If need able increase decrease flow limiting pressure . In subsequent procedure surgeon use setting achieve previous procedure . After 10 procedure collect best setting future default setup Aqueduct procedure . 2.4.3 Follow-up procedure . 2.4.3.1 Procedures assess efficacy : As standard procedure call gravitational flow 60 Cm patient , create free flow 350 270 milliliter per minute nominal pressure 60 cm H2O , efficacy prove following : 1 . Nominal flow 300ml/min 2 . Nominal pressure 60cm H2O As low result less risk patient . 2.4.3.2 Procedures assess safety : Closing input tap resectoscope lead operation pressure relief valve 180 cm H2O show protection achieve overpressure . 2.4.4 Schedule activity ( Study Table ) . Incorporated referenced attachment table summarize protocol procedure perform screen , treatment diagnosis , follow-up . 2.5 Study outcome evaluation : 2.5.1 Study endpoint . After procedure surgeon fill protocol summary ( per attachment chapter 11 ) : observation 1 . If continuous flow maintain procedure 2 . If ease use equipment acceptable 3 . Any ideas improvement next system generation The study endpoint least 10 procedure use Aqueduct . The secondary objective satisfy ideas improvement next system generation . 2.5.2 Sample size determination . There need perform clinical trial . The justification sample size select estimated time need evaluate system . 2.5.3 Outcome data data analysis . Average observation and/or measurement result use system efficiently primary result experiment . The , secondary result outcomes clinical study suggestion improvement . The result use reach production model Aqueduct . 3.0 Risk Analysis 3.1 Anticipated risk : Risks patient limited system extract overpressure organ operate . The step take reduce risk triple 1 . Set system low parameter pressure value use current procedure 2 . A pressure sensor incorporate within Y-Set provide pressure reading prevent overpressure . 3 . In case system failure control low pressure mechanical safety valve set 180 cm H2O prevents risk large pressure . 4 . During operation pressure read appear screen warn message appear surgeon decide stop use Aqueduct move standard procedure . The system design ease transfer solution bag Y-Set standard gravitational activate pole . Since overpressure immediately detect acted upon real risk benefit patient . The benefit assess % flow average 330ml/min without system % pressure minimal 60 cmH2O use standard procedure . 3.2 Adverse event recording/reporting 3.2.1 Adverse event definition . Adverse effect . There reasonable possibility adverse effect may cause investigational device , applicable , study treatment diagnostic product ( ) . Disability . Serious adverse effect . Any adverse effect result follow outcome : death , life-threatening adverse effect , inpatient hospitalization prolongation exist hospitalization , persistent significant disability/incapacity , congenital anomaly/birth defect . - Hospitalization shall include initial admission ( even less 24 hour ) healthcare facility result precipitate clinical adverse effect ; include transfer within hospital intensive care unit . Hospitalization prolongation hospitalization absence precipitating , clinical adverse effect ( e.g. , preexist condition associate new adverse effect worsen preexist condition ; admission protocol-specified procedure ) , , serious adverse effect . If investigator-sponsor 's final determination causality `` unknown related investigational device , applicable , study treatment diagnostic product ( ) '' , determination rationale determination document respective subject 's case history . 3.2.4 Reporting adverse effect FDA . ) The investigator-sponsor submit complete Form FDA 3500 A FDA 's Center Devices Radiological Health observe volunteered adverse effect determine unanticipated adverse device effect . Follow-up information report adverse effect submit IRB soon relevant information available . If result sponsor-investigator 's follow-up investigation show adverse effect initially determine require reporting IRB , fact , meet requirement report ; investigator-sponsor report adverse effect IRB soon possible , event later 10 calendar day , determination make . 3.3 Withdrawal subject due adverse effect : In case researcher decides subject unsuitable experiment subject withdrawn study . There replacement endpoint may include less planned subject . 4.0 Description Investigational Device The robotic technology base use solution bag . This electro-mechanic system replace manual bag-switching procedure automatic one . The system consist several-sub mechanism identify bag solution end , open flow buffer bag , pull spike Y-set empty bag , move spike new bag , remove protective cover , spikes switch flow buffer bag current bag - thus enable continuous irrigation . The system build flow pressure accord procedure need enables surgeon first time , directly control switch foot pedal allow clear visibility surgical site whenever drop , often happen surgery due excessive bleeding.. The problem solve : 1 . Stoppage fluid flow ( timely fluid bag replacement nurse ) 2 . Physician control flow prevent vision block excess bleed 3 . Prolonged operation time 4 Glycinemia risk patient 5 . Urethra injuries enter endoscope 6 . Post operation blood clot The design create ensure `` user-friendly fool-proof `` system . Flow Med offer purchase electro-mechanic system along disposable Y-sets design exclusively Flow Med system A microcontroller supervise operation system set correct control algorithm provide continuous flow . 2 Heads incorporate . One fix position one rotating hanging bag carousel . Each head include 3 stepper motor one remove cap bag , one move spike ut bag one open close flow . A peristaltic pump use create require flow . The following sensor include system : 1 . Weight sensor - measure weight bag help decide time switch bag 2 . Pressure sensor system main body sterile pressure capin Y-Set help prevent overpressure A Safety relief valve 180 cmH2O incorporate Y-Set prevent overpressure . A safety switch prevents movement motor front door open . The cover secure screws prevent removal . 5.0 Monitoring Procedures The sponsor-investigator permit direct access study monitor appropriate regulatory authority study data correspond source data document verify accuracy data . The system design accord ISO14385 standard . Electrical safety test perform IEC 60601-1 Electromagnetic Compatibility ( EMC ) test test accord IEC 60601-1-2 ITL ( Israel Test Laboratories ) certificate show passed standard test . Appendix : 1 .
